CustomField.formula:
IF(D_B_Data_Available__c = False, null,
(0.25* IF(Commercial_Credit_Percentile__c>0.90,10, IF(Commercial_Credit_Percentile__c>0.70,8, IF(Commercial_Credit_Percentile__c>0.50,6, IF(Commercial_Credit_Percentile__c>0.30,4, IF(Commercial_Credit_Percentile__c>0.10,2,0)))))) + (0.2* IF(Slow_Negative__c<=0.05,10, IF(Slow_Negative__c<=0.10,7, IF(Slow_Negative__c<=0.15,5, IF(Slow_Negative__c<=0.20,3,0))))) +
(0.3* IF(Financial_Stress_Score_Percentile__c>=0.95,10, IF(Financial_Stress_Score_Percentile__c>=0.69,9, IF(Financial_Stress_Score_Percentile__c>=0.34,7, IF(Financial_Stress_Score_Percentile__c>=0.2,3,0))))) +
(0.25* IF(PAYDEX__c>=80,10, IF(PAYDEX__c>=75,8, IF(PAYDEX__c>=70,6, IF(PAYDEX__c>=65,4, IF(PAYDEX__c>=60,2,IF(PAYDEX__c>=55,1,0))))))))
CustomField.label: Credit Scorecard Score
